an1.1:0.2: The Chapter on What Occupies the Mind
an1.1:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
an1.1:1.3: There the Buddha addressed the mendicants,
an1.1:2.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single sight that occupies a man’s mind like the sight of a woman.
an1.1:2.2: The sight of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”
an1.2:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single sound that occupies a man’s mind like the sound of a woman.
an1.2:1.2: The sound of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”
an1.3:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single smell that occupies a man’s mind like the smell of a woman.
an1.3:1.2: The smell of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”
an1.4:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single taste that occupies a man’s mind like the taste of a woman.
an1.4:1.2: The taste of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”
an1.5:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single touch that occupies a man’s mind like the touch of a woman.
an1.5:1.2: The touch of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”
an1.6:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single sight that occupies a woman’s mind like the sight of a man.
an1.6:1.2: The sight of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”
an1.7:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single sound that occupies a woman’s mind like the sound of a man.
an1.7:1.2: The sound of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”
an1.8:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single smell that occupies a woman’s mind like the smell of a man.
an1.8:1.2: The smell of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”
an1.9:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single taste that occupies a woman’s mind like the taste of a man.
an1.9:1.2: The taste of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”
an1.10:1.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single touch that occupies a woman’s mind like the touch of a man.
an1.10:1.2: The touch of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”
